GSD.product_version: versions from v5.18 to before v5.18.4
GSD.description:
ax25: Fix ax25 session cleanup problems

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.4 by commit ae054931a87ec79ebcf32b78c96e6b4550dab95c, it was introduced in version v5.18 by commit 82e31755e55fbcea6a9dfaae5fe4860ade17cbc0. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ax25: Fix ax25 session cleanup problems
